title: Design of American public education
creator_credit: McGraw-Hill Films and United Productions of America
brief_description: Describes the organisational structure of a centrally controlled public education system and the decentralised system under state supervision. Points out that a basic objective of American public education is the advancement of an individualised system intended to produce students capable of assuming an adult role in society.
